title: Goal-Based Programming and Backward Design Strategies for Early Childhood and Elementary Education Design

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding Foundational Pedagogy and Instructional Design Theories
context.additional_context: Program for prospective professional teachers in digital device-enabled environments

learning_goals: Learners can create early childhood and elementary education design documents by applying a backward design model.
Learners can design concept maps and develop assessment criteria using goal-based programming.
Learners can select context-appropriate instructional design strategies for diverse educational environments (integrated, open/closed structures).
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
